SA10n1056:1: atrāha - vidyanta eva saṃskṛtasvabhāvato vijñānādayaḥ saṃskṛtā dharmāḥ,
SA10n1056:15: syādvijñānādikaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ yadi tasya niṣpādakakarmakārakau syātām |
SA10n1056:17: sadbhūtaḥ kārakaḥ karma sadbhūtaṃ na karotyayam |
SA10n1056:21: tacca karaṇaṃ sadbhūtasya vā kartuḥ parikalpyeta,
SA10n1056:27: tatra sadbhūtaḥ kārakaḥ kriyāyuktaḥ sadbhūtaṃ kriyāyuktaṃ karma na karotītyekā pratijñā |
SA10n1056:28: idānīmasadbhūto'pi kriyākārakarahito'sadbhutaṃ kriyārahitaṃ karma na karotītyaparā pratijñā ||1 ||
SA10n1056:30: sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti karma ca syādakartṛkam |
SA10n1056:32: karoti kriyāyukta eva kaścitsadbhūtaḥ kārakavyapadeśaṃ labhate,
SA10n1056:33: tataśca tasyaivaṃvidhasya kriyāhetukalabdhakārakavyapadeśasya aparā kriyā nāsti yayā karma kuryāt |
SA10n1056:34: kriyābhāvācca yadā kārakaḥ karma na karoti,
SA10n1056:36: na cākartṛkaṃ karma saṃbhavati bandhyāsūnoriva ghaṭakaraṇamiti | evaṃ tāvat
SA10n1056:37: sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti karma ca syādakartṛkam |
SA10n1056:38: iti doṣaprasaṅgāt sadbhūtaḥ kārakaḥ karma na karoti |
SA10n1056:39: idānīṃ sadbhūtamapi karma kārako na karotīti pratipādayannāha -
SA10n1056:40: sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti kartā ca syādakarmakaḥ ||2 ||
SA10n1056:42: tasyedānīṃ kriyānibandhanalabdhakarmavyapadeśasya aparā kriyā nāsti yayā karma kriyeteti |
SA10n1056:46: yadā ca na karoti karmaṇo dvitīyakriyābhāvāt,
SA10n1056:47: tadā akarmaka eva avidyamānakarmaka eva tasya karmaṇaḥ kārakaḥ syāt |
SA10n1056:50: evaṃ sadbhūtaḥ kārakaḥ sadbhūtaṃ karma na karoti iti saṃsādhya idānīṃ yathā asadbhūtamapi karma asadbhūtaḥ kārako na karoti tathā pratipādayannāha -
SA10n1056:54: kriyā ca kārakavyapadeśe heturiti kriyārahita kārako'pi nirhetukaḥ syāt |
SA10n1056:56: sati ca ahetukavādābhyupagame kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca sarvamapoditaṃ syādityāha -
SA10n1056:57: hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca na vidyate |
SA10n1056:58: satyeva hi hetorabhyupagame hetunā yanniṣpādyate tat kāryam,
SA10n1056:59: tasya ca yo niṣpādakaḥ tatkāraṇamiti yujyate |
SA10n1056:65: hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca na vidyate |
SA10n1056:67: tadabhāve kriyā kartā karaṇaṃ ca na vidyate ||4 ||
SA10n1056:70: kasyāṃ vā kriyāyāṃ kumbhakārasya svātantryātkartṛtvaṃ syāt?
SA10n1056:71: na cāpi mṛdāṃ tādātmyapravṛttyā sādhakatamatvena karaṇatvaṃ yujyata iti evaṃ tāvat -
SA10n1056:72: tadabhāve kriyā kartā karaṇaṃ ca na vidyate ||
SA10n1056:75: iha yadā devadattaḥ prāṇātipātaviratikriyāsvātantryātkartā san svatantrakāryeṇa karaṇa bhūtena prāṇātipātaviratikriyāṃ karoti,
SA10n1056:77: evaṃ daśasvapi kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu kuśalakriyāniṣpādyeṣu ratnatrayamātāpitṛtadanyapūjyapūjādilakṣaṇeṣu ca kuśaladharmaprārambheṣu yojyam |
SA10n1056:78: evamadharme'pi prāṇātipātādilakṣaṇe kuśalaviparyayeṇa kriyākartṛkaraṇānāmabhāve sati karmaṇāmabhāvaprasaṅga udbhāvanīyaḥ ||
SA10n1056:81: dharme cāsatyadharme ca phalaṃ tajjaṃ na vidyate ||5 ||
SA10n1056:90: yadi ca mokṣalakṣaṇaṃ nirvāṇaṃ phalaṃ syāt,
SA10n1056:99: tā api sarvāḥ phalābhāve sati nopapadyanta iti |
SA10n1056:103: saddhiḥ asadbhūtaḥ kārako'sadbhūtaṃ karma karotīti pakṣo nikṛṣṭa eveti tyājyaḥ ||6 ||
SA10n1056:108: tat sadasadbhūtaḥ kārako na karotīti | yasmāt -
SA10n1056:110: ekaḥ padārthaḥ ekasmin kāle kriyāyuktaścākriyāyuktaśceti na yujyata evaitat |
SA10n1056:111: tataśca sadasadbhūto'pi kārakaḥ sadasadbhūtaṃ karma na karoti,
SA10n1056:113: evaṃ same pakṣe dūṣaṇamudbhāvya viṣamapakṣasyāpi nirācikīrṣayā āha -
SA10n1056:114: satā ca kriyate nāsannāsatā kriyate ca sat |
SA10n1056:116: satā sadbhūtena tāvatkartrā kriyāyuktena asadbhūtamasadakriyāyuktaṃ karma na kriyate | yasmāt -
SA10n1056:117: sarve prasajyante doṣāstatra ta eva hi ||8 ||
SA10n1056:118: sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti karma ca syādakartṛkam |
SA10n1056:119: ityevaṃ tāvat sadbhūtaḥ kārakaḥ karma na karoti,
SA10n1056:121: asadbhūtaṃ hi karma ahetukaṃ bhavet | tataśca -
SA10n1056:122: hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca na vidyate ||
SA10n1056:125: yathā caitat satā kartrā asatkarma na kriyate iti pratipāditam,
SA10n1056:126: evamasatā kartrā akriyāyuktena satkarma na kriyate iti vyākhyeyamuktapathānusāreṇa ||8 ||
SA10n1056:127: evaṃ tāvadviṣamapakṣe ekaikapadaparāmarśena dūṣaṇamabhidhāya idānīmekaikasya padasya padadvaya parāmarśena dūṣaṇābhidhānamāha -
SA10n1056:130: sa kārakaḥ sadbhūtaḥ asadbhūtaṃ karma sadasadbhūtameva vā na karotīti |
SA10n1056:132: tatra 'sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti' ityādinā sadbhūtaḥ kārako na karoti |
SA10n1056:133: asadbhūtamapi karma na kriyate' ahetukaṃ bhavetkarma ' 'hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca ' ityādinā vihitadoṣāt |
SA10n1056:137: evaṃ tāvatsadbhūtaḥ kārako'sadbhūtaṃ sadasadbhutaṃ ca karma na karoti ||9 ||
SA10n1056:138: idānīmasadbhūto'pi kārakaḥ sadbhūtaṃ karma sadasadbhūtaṃ ca karma na karotītyāha -
SA10n1056:142: ' hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca ' ityādinā uktadoṣādasadbhūtaḥ kārako na karoti |
SA10n1056:143: sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti kartā ca syādakarmakaḥ |
SA10n1056:144: iti prasaṅgāt sadbhūtaṃ karma na kriyate |
SA10n1056:148: idānīṃ sadasadbhūto'pi kārakaḥ ekaika evobhayarūpaḥ san yathā sadbhūtamasadbhūtaṃ ca bhinnasaṃketaṃ karma na karoti tathā pratipādayannāha -
SA10n1056:153: sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti kartā ca syādakarmakaḥ |
SA10n1056:155: asadbhūtamapi karma ahetukaṃ 'hetāvasati kārya ca' ityādinoktadoṣānna kriyate |
SA10n1056:156: yataścaivaṃ samapakṣeṣu viṣamapakṣeṣu ca kartuḥ karmaṇaśca sarvathā siddhirayuktā,
SA10n1056:157: tasmādyaduktaṃ vidyanta eva vijñānādayaḥ saṃskṛtā dharmāḥ saṃskṛtasvabhāvāḥ taddhetukakarmakārakasadbhāvāditi,
SA10n1056:159: atrāha - kimavadhāritametadbhavatā na santi bhāvā iti? na hi |
SA10n1056:160: bhavatastu sasvabhāva- vādinaḥ svabhāvasya bhāvānāṃ vaidhuryātsarvabhāvāpavādaḥ saṃbhāvyate |
SA10n1056:165: yadi nāstīti tattoyaṃ gṛhṇīyānmūḍha eva saḥ ||
SA10n1056:167: nāstīti cāpi moho'yaṃ sati mohe na mucyate ||
SA10n1056:169: yadā na labhate bhāvamevābhāvastadā kuha || iti ||11 ||
SA10n1056:171: tasmāllaukikaṃ viparyāsa- mabhyupetya sāṃvṛtānāṃ padārthānāṃ marīcikājalakalpānāmidaṃpratyayatāmātrābhyupagamenaiva prasiddhirnānyene tyāha -
SA10n1056:172: pratītya kārakaḥ karma taṃ pratītya ca kārakam |
SA10n1056:175: iha akurvāṇasya karmanirapekṣasya kārakatvābhāvāt karmāpekṣya kārakasya kārakatvaṃ bhavati |
SA10n1056:177: taṃ kārakaṃ pratītya karma pravartate ityevaṃ karmakārakayoḥ parasparāpekṣikīṃ siddhiṃ muktvā nānyatsiddhikāraṇaṃ paśyāmaḥ ||12 ||
SA10n1056:185: sā ca svasādhanaṃ kartāramupādātāraṃ karma copādānaṃ saṃnidhāpayati |
SA10n1056:186: tayośca upādeyopā dātroḥ parasparāpekṣayoḥ karmakārakavadeva siddhirna svābhāvikī |
SA10n1056:187: kasmātpunaḥ svābhāvikī na bhavati ityāha - vyutsargāditi karmaṇaḥ,
SA10n1056:191: tataśca ayamartha upapadyate - yaireva hetubhiḥ karmaṇaśca vyutsargo'smābhiruktaḥ ,
SA10n1056:192: taireva hetubhiḥ upādātā upādeyaṃ ca pratiṣiddhaṃ veditavyam |
SA10n1056:193: na ca kevalamanayoranyonyāpekṣikī siddhiḥ katurśca karmaṇaśca pratiṣedhenāvaseyā, api ca
SA10n1056:198: teṣāṃ kartṛkarmavicāreṇa svabhāvato'stitvaṃ pratiṣidhya parasparāpekṣikīmeva siddhi prājño nirmumukṣurjātijarāmaraṇādibandhanebhyo mokṣāya vibhāvayet ||
SA10n1056:200: nanu ca śeṣān bhāvān vibhāvayedityanenaiva upādānopādānnoradhigatatvādupādānopādānaṃ punarayuktam |
SA10n1056:203: tathā hi uttareṣu prakaraṇeṣu bhūyasā anayoreva vicāro bhaviṣyatīti |
SA10n1056:205: bhaya darśita nairayikaṃ me sattvasahasra savejita naike |
SA10n1056:206: na ca vidyati kaściha sattva yo cyutu gacchati ghoramapāyam ||
SA10n1056:207: na ca kāraku kāraṇaṃ santi yehi kṛtā asitomaraśastrāḥ |
SA10n1056:208: kalpavaśena tu paśyati tatra kāyi patanti apāyita śastrāḥ ||
SA10n1056:210: teṣvapi kāraku nāstiha kaści te'pi ca sthāpita kalpavaśena ||
SA10n1056:211: kalpavaśena vikalpitu lokaḥ saṃjñagaheṇa vikalpitu bālaḥ |
SA10n1056:212: so ca gaho agaho asabhūto māyamarīcisamā hi vikalpāḥ ||iti || 13 ||
